original_dialogue:

System: Then why are so many crazy about it
User I don't know.Maybe they are really crazy .
System: Maybe .

original_dialogue:

original_dialogue:

original_dialogue:
System: Hey Joanne . What are you up to ?
User I'm just watching some television .
System: I'm so bored . I don't know what I'm going to do today and it is only ten in the morning .
User Me too . Do you think we are boring people ?
System: I don't think we are boring . It's just that we don't have any hobbies .
User That's right . What do you think we should do as a hobby ?
System: That all depends on what you like to do . For example , I like to doodle on the notepad , so I'm thinking about doing some real drawings .
User I like to play the piano for fun .
System: Yeah . That can be a good hobby .
User Hobbies are great . I'm going to make a list of all the things I like to do .
System: That's a great idea . I'm going to do the same .

preferences.reasoning: The user expresses interest in hobbies and indicates a specific preference for playing the piano as a fun activity, suggesting enjoyment and a positive sentiment towards this hobby.
The user acknowledges the value of hobbies positively and expresses a proactive intention to make a list of activities they enjoy, reflecting an engagement with their interests.

original_dialogue:
System: How is your house hunting going ?
User Not very well . I haven ’ t found anything within my price range yet .
System: How much are you looking to spend ?
User I can only afford about 300 pounds a month .
System: Looks like you ’ re not going to get more than a bedroom in a shared flat with that .
User Really ? That ’ s a lot of money to pay for one room .
System: Well , if you want to live in London , you have to pay the price !
User Do you know of anyone who needs a roommate ?
System: I can ask around at work . Do you have a preference for makers or non-smokers ?
User I ’ d prefer non-smoking roommates , but I guess I ’ ll have to take what I can get !
System: How long do you want to sign a contract for ?
User I can sign a contract up to a year . I don ’ t know where I ’ ll be after that .
System: Do you need a furnished or unfurnished apartment ?
User I don ’ t have any furniture , so it ’ d be great if it were furnished .
System: You know that you ’ ll have to pay utilities on top of the rent , right ?
User No , I thought that would be included in the rent .
System: It ’ s not usually included , so you ’ ll have to factor in about 100 pounds more each month for utilities .
User I don't think I can afford that .
System: Don ’ t worry . Sometimes people will give you a discount if you promise to do the cleaning or take care of the children .
User That ’ s a good idea . I ’ ll look into finding something like that .

preferences.reasoning: User expresses a desire to live with non-smoking roommates for a healthier living environment.
User indicates a need for a furnished apartment due to not having any furniture, highlighting their dependency on this condition for comfortable living.
preferences.original_mention: it’d be great if it were furnished

original_dialogue:

System: I'm OK . How are you doing ?

System: Do you mean The Bangkok ?
User That's the one . A bunch of us are going there for dinner tomorrow night.How about coming with us ?
System: Sure , I'd love to .
User Great . I'll call and make reservations .
System: Any time after 6 o'clock is good for me.Oh ! I'm late ! I have a class .
User All right . I'll call you tonight and tell you the time .
System: Great . Talk to you then .

User expresses a desire for the friend to join them for dinner, demonstrating a wanting for social interaction and companionship during this experience.

original_dialogue:

original_dialogue:
System: Wow , you ’ re up early today ! What ’ s for breakfast ?
User Well , I felt like baking , so I made some muffins .
System: Smells good ! I ’ ll make some coffee . Do you want me to make you some eggs ?
User Sure , I'll take mine , sunny side up .
System: Www , I don ’ t know how you can eat your eggs like that ! Ever since I was small , I ’ Ve had eggs and soldiers .
User You know , my dad had scrambled eggs every morning for twenty years . It drove my mom crazy !
System: You know what really drives me crazy ? When I ask for soft boiled eggs , and they overcook them , so they come out hard boiled ! How can you dipyour toast into a hard boiled egg ?
User You ’ re so picky sometimes .
System: Here you go , honey , fried eggs .
User Dammit ! I asked for sunny side up ! How many times do I have to tell you .

preferences.reasoning: The user clearly expresses a strong preference for how they want their eggs cooked, indicating a dislike for being served a different style. This reflects a strong need for personalization in their food preferences.

original_dialogue:

original_dialogue:
System: Let's go to Wangfujing by bus .
User Better take the subway . It's faster , and more convenient .
System: OK , it will be a new experience for me .
User We have a rather comprehensive subway system here . You can get almost anywhere rather quickly on a subway , especially at this time of day when the traffic is heavy .
System: Where do we pay the fare ?
User Just give the man standing there 3 yuan and he'll give you a token . Then , you slip it into the slot at the turnstile and push the turnstile to get in .
System: Let me pay for it . Where can I get a subway map ?
User Ask the worker who sells tokens to give you one . It's free fo charge . Actually maps showing subway routes are posted at most stations .
System: Do I have to pay an additional fare to change trains ?
User No , you don't have to . Here comes the train .

preferences.reasoning: The user expresses a preference for the subway over the bus, indicating that the subway is faster and more convenient. This shows a liking for the subway system due to its efficiency, particularly in heavy traffic.

The user emphasizes the comprehensive nature of the subway system and its ability to facilitate quick travel. This suggests a strong appreciation for the practicality of the subway as a mode of transportation, which is likely linked to their daily experiences.

original_dialogue:
System: Look , there's no way we can convince people they need fresh motor oil every morning .
User No , but you can let them know that yours is the cream of the crop-the purest motor oil in the world . Careful , hold it by the java jacket . This coffee drink has half and half-what do you think ?
System: It tastes funny . Why can't people just stick to plain and simple coffee ?
User That's just the point ! Purity is the essence of good coffee , right ?

preferences.reasoning: User emphasizes that purity is the most important quality for good coffee, indicating a clear preference for high-quality, pure coffee.

original_dialogue:

User It's not really all that good . The bedroom is a little small for us .
System: Small , but it should be enough for our needs . I think .
User But there's no hot water after 10 at night . Sometimes I like to have a hot shower before bed . especially in the winter . It feels good .
System: That's true . But I love the living room ; it's huge and filled with sunshine .
User True , and I like the kitchen . It's new and well equipped .
System: It has a great balcony with an incredible view of the park .
User You're right . The view is spectacular . But that bedroom is so small . We'd never be able to fit all of our stuff in there .
System: Maybe we could get some new furniture . Better stuff .
User I haven't thought of that .

original_dialogue:
System: Do you like Barry ?
User No , not very much . He ’ s too ambitious and dishonest .
System: I agree . I like his brother , Paul . They are not alike .
User Yes . They are completely different . Paul is very sociable and much more honest than his brother .
System: What kind of person do you consider yourself to be ?
User I think I ’ m polite , careful , relaxed and shy .
System: Oh , I don ’ t think you ’ re shy ! You are always chatting with new people when we go to a party .
User Well , yes , but those people always start talking to me . I never talk to them first . Perhaps I ’ m not as shy as I think . Anyway , you ’ re certainly not shy !
System: You ’ re right . I love going out and making new friends .
User So , you ’ ll be at my birthday party on Friday ?
System: Of course !

preferences.reasoning: The User expresses a clear disliking for Barry due to his ambitious and dishonest nature, indicating a strong negative sentiment toward him.
preferences.original_mention: No, not very much . He ’ s too ambitious and dishonest .

preferences.reasoning: The User shows a positive regard for Paul, appreciating his sociable and honest nature in contrast to Barry, thus indicating a strong liking for him.
preferences.original_mention: Paul is very sociable and much more honest than his brother.

preferences.reasoning: The User describes themselves in a way that suggests they possess a degree of social etiquette and qualities like being polite and careful, which conveys a personal need to see themselves in a positive light.

original_dialogue:
System: What's the best way downtown ?
User Let me see . It depends .
System: Depends ? Depends on what ?
User If you are in a hurry , you should take a taxi .
System: Is that expensive ?
User Yes , very . Believe it or not , it will cost you more than one hundred dollars .
System: I am in no particular hurry .
User Take a bus then . It will only cost you 5 dollars .
System: That's not so bad .

preferences.reasoning: The User expresses a clear preference for taking the bus as a more economical option compared to taking a taxi, which is deemed very expensive.

original_dialogue:
System: That's great ! We made 20 minutes earlier .
User Good thing , we took a taxi .
System: Mom , you are the best !

System: Mom , come on . What are you thinking about ?
User Your sister is in high school now ; no one plays the piano at home .
System: Don't tell me you want me to do that ?
User Why ? Why not ! The piano is right there .
System: But I don't like playing the piano . And the homework keeps me busy enough .
User Anyway , I will have a look at the piano class after work by myself .
System: How depressed !

original_dialogue:
System: What shall we do after the volleyball match ?
User How about going to the Olympic souvenir store to have a look ? I remember there is one in the gym .
System: That's a good idea . I was thinking of buying some gifts for my family .
User Me , too . What did you have in mind ?
System: I haven't decided yet , but I think the Olympic Mascots are a must .
User I agree . They're very lovely , especially Huanhuan
System: Is that the red one ? That is my favorite , too . Do you know how much they are ?
User The five dolls are sold together as a set , and they're priced according to the size . The bigger they are the more expensive .
System: Oh , I see . If I buy more than a set , can I get any discount ?
User I don't think so . All the souvenirs of the Olympic Games are very hot right now .
System: Any other ideas ?
User There are lots of things , such as postcards , key chains , posters and various arts and crafts .
System: It all sounds great . We can go there after the match . I can't wait to see what they have .

preferences.reasoning: The user expresses a liking for the Olympic mascots, specifically stating that they are 'very lovely,' which indicates a positive sentiment towards them.

original_dialogue:
System: So , tell me about you new house . How is it different to your old one ?
User Well , first of all , it ’ s much bigger . It has the same number of rooms , but each room is larger . We also have a larger garden , which our dog loves , of course !
System: So , it ’ s a three-bedrooms detached house ?
User Yes . One bedroom is for my wife and I . there ’ s another for our daughter . My wife wants to use the third one as a guest room , but I ’ d like to make it into a study . Our daughter is also keen on making it a study , so that ’ s probably what will happen .
System: What ’ s the kitchen like ? I know both you and your wife like to cook .
User That ’ s one of the main reason we chose that particular house . The kitchen and dining room are together . It ’ s really large .
System: Are the rooms nice and bright ?
User Yes , they are . That ’ s very important to us . We like to live in a home with plenty of natural light . Each room has large windows .
System: Do you have a balcony ?
User No , we don ’ t . We wish weがあったのに . That ’ s the only thing we wanted , but don ’ t have . The area is very nice and the neighbours seem friendly .
System: You ’ re right on the edge of the city , aren ’ t you ? There can ’ t be much noise or traffic there . Is it easy to get into city centre ?
User It ’ s a very quiet neighbourhood . There ’ s some traffic , but not much . It ’ s not very difficult to get to the city centre , but you must remember to turn left and right at the right places or you ’ ll get lost . So when are you going to drop by ?

preferences.reasoning: User expresses strong positive feelings towards having a home with plenty of natural light, highlighting its importance to them.
User is disappointed about not having a balcony, indicating a desire for it which was not fulfilled, suggesting it was important to them.

original_dialogue:
System: OK , Ann , you spent quite a bit of time in Australia recently so why don't you talk about that ?
User I really liked living in Australia . I was an international student and I studied education at the university of Sydney . And living in Sydney was fantasticbecuase I could go to the beach anytime I wanted and there was a great nightlife in Sydney . There are lots of great clubs . And people were very , very friendly and easy-going and I met a lot of international people in living Sydney .
System: Mm-hm . How long were you there ?
User I was there for almost a year .
System: Oh , OK .
User And I travelled a little bit in Australia . I went up the east coast . Up to Frasier Island . Which is a world heritage site . And I saw dingo running along the beach and sharks in the water . We climbed cliffs and went through a rain forest and went camping and then we went up to the ... , which is a but north . And the further north you go in Australia , the hotter it gets . So we were able to go swimming in the ocean and I went diving for the first time but it was a little bit risky cause I didn't have a diving license , so I went on an introductory dive and I saw a giant clam that had a really purple spongy inside that I was able to touch and then the clam closed up really quickly .
System: So , did you , did you lose your finger ?
User Almost .
System: Almost . Ah , you're lucky . Um , it's funny , you go in the water and you worry about sharks , but not clams .
User Exactly .
System: Will you be going back to Australia soon ?
User I'd like to go and live there for at least another year . Probably I'll go back to Sydney or maybe I'll go down to Melbourne because it's a really interesting cultural city . They have lot of museums and parks .

preferences.reasoning: User expresses a strong desire to return to Australia and live there for at least another year, demonstrating a clear liking for the environment and lifestyle there.
preferences.original_mention: I'd like to go and live there for at least another year

preferences.reasoning: User shows a preference for Sydney and mentions wanting to return there, indicating a strong positive sentiment towards the city.
preferences.original_mention: probably I'll go back to Sydney

preferences.reasoning: User mentions Melbourne as a potentially appealing place due to its cultural offerings, reflecting a positive interest in exploring new experiences.
preferences.original_mention: maybe I'll go down to Melbourne because it's a really interesting cultural city
